entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: WNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening then northwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
